alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wayne; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 10:13AM CST until March 14 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Little Wabash River at Carmi .Minor flooding continues on the Little Wabash River at Carmi. The river is currently cresting near 29.3 feet and then will begin a slow fall. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage Tuesday. For the Little Wabash River...including Carmi...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Wabash River at Carmi. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CST Friday the stage was 29.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 29.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
